video_prompt: City lights pulsate. Trams glide and halt. People converse at outdoor cafes. Trees sway gently in a vibrant, comic-book city, as a statued dome, lit from within, emanates a warm glow, all under a shifting starry sky.
image_prompt: Vibrant, detailed, comic-book/anime style illustration of a bustling city street at dusk/night. Tall, modern skyscrapers with many lit windows under a starry sky. Ornate, lit building with domed roof and statue. Lively foreground: classical buildings with illuminated windows, lush green areas with trees and flowering plants, outdoor dining with people. Two double-decker trams (red, light blue) on tram-tracked street. Buildings with balconies and potted plants, continuous green corridor. Dynamic urban environment, fantastical aesthetic with bright, glowing colors.
refined_video_prompt: City lights pulsate. Trams smoothly glide, then halt. People at outdoor cafes subtly gesticulate and mouth words. Gentle swaying moves the trees. A statued dome's internal light dynamically emanates, its warm glow visibly spreading outwards, all under a shifting, starry sky.
